main event: A white-glowing elongated object was observed slowly moving in a northwest to southeast direction at a fairly high altitude in Maywood, Illinois on April 13, 1962.
interesting points: The object changed shape and reversed direction, reversing at one point.
It was fuzzy or blurred and appeared to be oscillating or vibrating.
The object disappeared behind clouds and reappeared several times during the 3-4 minute observation.
The report indicates the object was likely an air vehicle rather than a misidentification.
Details of the changing shape, reversing direction, and brief periods of visual acquisition were consistent with an air vehicle analysis.
